trans-unit.source: Delete a certificate from an account
trans-unit.target: Delete a certificate from an account

trans-unit.source: Deletes a certificate from the specified account.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a certificate from the specified account.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to certificates.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to certificates.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: DELETE
trans-unit.target: DELETE

trans-unit.source: Replace {certificate-thumbprint} with the thumbprint of the certificate that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {certificate-thumbprint} with the thumbprint of the certificate that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Status code: 202 .
trans-unit.target: Status code: 202 .

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete a certificate if a resource (pool or compute node) is using it.
trans-unit.target: You cannot delete a certificate if a resource (pool or compute node) is using it.

trans-unit.source: Before you can delete a certificate, you must therefore make sure that:
trans-unit.target: Before you can delete a certificate, you must therefore make sure that:

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not associated with any existing pools.
trans-unit.target: The certificate is not associated with any existing pools.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not associated with any pool that is currently being created.
trans-unit.target: The certificate is not associated with any pool that is currently being created.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not installed on any compute nodes.
trans-unit.target: The certificate is not installed on any compute nodes.

trans-unit.source: (Even if you remove a certificate from a pool, it is not removed from existing compute nodes in that pool until they restart.)
trans-unit.target: (Even if you remove a certificate from a pool, it is not removed from existing compute nodes in that pool until they restart.)

trans-unit.source: No running tasks depend on the certificate.
trans-unit.target: No running tasks depend on the certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you try to delete a certificate that is in use, the deletion fails.
trans-unit.target: If you try to delete a certificate that is in use, the deletion fails.

trans-unit.source: The certificate status changes to deletefailed.
trans-unit.target: The certificate status changes to deletefailed.

trans-unit.source: You can use Cancel Delete Certificate to set the status back to active if you decide that you want to continue using the certificate.
trans-unit.target: You can use Cancel Delete Certificate to set the status back to active if you decide that you want to continue using the certificate.
